title: Waking Up Woke | Guests: Gov. Greg Abbott & Jeffy Fisher | 4/23/19
description:
Hour 1
And the Woke list continues. More things to add to the 'what is racist' list? That's why darkies were born. ...Bernie Sanders thinks murders should be able to vote. Ex convict talks to Glenn, "I have paid my debit."
 
Hour 2
Texas Governor Greg Abbott calls into take Glenn's complaints. Property taxes are are skyrocketing out of control in a state that everyone is moving to. "We are going to hammer down the property taxes" ...America is being Fundamentally transformed right before our eyes? ...If it ain't broke AOC
 
Hour 3 
Jesus most likely was a Palestinian man? We are moving away from the MLK. Favoring groups by skin color is all the rage, again. Post modern deconstruction of American culture ...Time to play 'Is It David Duke or Amy Schumer' with Jeffy

content:encoded:
Hour 1 And the Woke list continues. More things to add to the 'what is racist' list? That's why darkies were born. ...Bernie Sanders thinks murders should be able to vote. Ex convict talks to Glenn, "I have paid my debit."   Hour 2 Texas Governor Greg Abbott calls into take Glenn's complaints. Property taxes are are skyrocketing out of control in a state that everyone is moving to. "We are going to hammer down the property taxes" ...America is being Fundamentally transformed right before our eyes? ...If it ain't broke AOC   Hour 3  Jesus most likely was a Palestinian man? We are moving away from the MLK. Favoring groups by skin color is all the rage, again. Post modern deconstruction of American culture ...Time to play 'Is It David Duke or Amy Schumer' with Jeffy
